title: South Korean President Yoon faces impeachment: How did we get here?
content: South Korean President Yoon Suk Yeol is facing impeachment by parliament after he declared martial law only to revoke it 6 hours later amid immense backlash.
summary: South Korean President Yoon Suk Yeol is facing impeachment by parliament after he declared martial law only to revoke it 6 hours later amid immense backlash.

title: Bitcoin tops $100,000 as monster 2024 rally reaches new heights
content: Bitcoin had been widely expected to reach $100,000 since the U.S. presidential election but investors sent it to this mark much sooner than expected.
summary: Bitcoin had been widely expected to reach $100,000 since the U.S. presidential election but investors sent it to this mark much sooner than expected.

title: Food prices are at their highest levels in over a year. And these items will get even more expensive

title: UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson fatally shot in New York in targeted attack

title: Alibaba-backed Xreal launches augmented reality glasses with new chip as Meta rivalry heats up

title: I’ve travelled to 40 countries with my aging parents. It's 'the best investment I've ever made'

title: GM expects more than $5 billion impact from China restructuring, including plant closures
